0.text: Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani receives  Frost Armor if she hasn't taken damage from enemy  champions or  monsters in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from them.

1.text: Frost Armor engulfs  Bristle in True Ice, granting Sejuani  slow immunity,  cripple immunity,  10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor, and  10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.

2.text: Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies  stunned by Sejuani become Frozen for the disable's duration. Sejuani's next basic attack or ability against a Frozen enemy will consume the effect to deal them 10% of their  maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 300 against epic monsters.

0.text: Active: Sejuani signals  Bristle to  dash to the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies in her path and  knocking them up for 1 second. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy  champion.

1.text: Sejuani can cast any of her abilities during Arctic Assault.

0.text: Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within and  knocking back all  minions and  monsters hit.

1.text: Sejuani then lashes out with her flail after the remaining 0.75 seconds of the cast time in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies struck and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.

2.text: Sejuani can move while casting Winter's Wrath. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow Sejuani's movement.

0.text: Passive:  Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied  melee champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy  champions, medium / large  monsters and large  minions for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks from them.

1.text: Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the  visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival consumes all stacks to deal them magic damage,  knock them down, and  stun them for 1 second.

2.text: Enemy champions  stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for 8 seconds.

3.text: Permafrost  resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

1.text: Upon reaching maximum range or colliding with an enemy champion after traveling over 400 units, the bola deals increased damage and instead  stuns for 1.5 seconds, and creates a frost storm at the surrounding area for 2 seconds which forms a glacier on the ground that  slows enemies within by 30% and grants  sight of the area in a smaller radius.

2.text: At the end of the duration, the glacier shatters, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  slowing them by 80% for 1 second as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.

3.text: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.

1.concerningText: Active: Sejuani signals  Bristle to  dash to the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies in her path and  knocking them up for 1 second. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy  champion.

2.concerningText: Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within and  knocking back all  minions and  monsters hit.

Sejuani then lashes out with her flail after the remaining 0.75 seconds of the cast time in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies struck and  slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.

4.concerningText: Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them magic damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

At the end of the duration, the glacier shatters, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  slowing them by 80% for 1 second as well as  revealing them and granting  sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+350 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Immolate: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within 325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12%, stacking up to 6 times for a 72% increase.
Unique – Flametouch: At maximum stacks, your basic attacks explode around you, burning nearby enemies for your current Immolate damage for 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5% slow resist and 5% tenacity.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IMMOLATE: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 12 − 30 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage every second to enemies within  325 (+100% bonus size) units, increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters. Damaging enemy champions or epic monsters with this effect grants a stack for 5 seconds, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12%, stacking up to 6 times for a 72% increase.

1.originHTML: +  +  600

passive.originHTML:
Passive

passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 10% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 60%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
